sense.gloss: to cut one's way into (an enemy position), to rush on, to raid, to attack
to press someone hard (e.g. with questions), to get to the heart of (a matter)

sdata.j: その↑場↑↓ば↓しのぎの↑対策↑↓たいさく↓では↑麻薬↑↓まやく↓↑中毒↑↓ちゅうどく↓↑問題↑↓もんだい↓に↑切↑↓|き↓り↑込↑↓こ↓む|ことはできないでしょう。
sdata.e: Stopgap measures won't make a dent in drug addiction.
